TL;DR of our DAO panel at #HacktheRainbow : 
- every account on NEAR is basically a mini DAO ✨🌈
- build DAOs for specific use cases
- you can build communities first then products
- you can even create a token BEFORE you have a product or even know if you will have a product 🤯 https://t.co/jChFPXmXSQ
